Class Transformations

java.lang.Object
Transformations
Direct Known Subclasses:
DCT_II, DFT
public abstract class Transformations
extends java.lang.Object
This class encapsulates 1D-transformation algorithms.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Transformations()
    No parameter constructor

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract void calculateResultOfTransformation()
    This abstract method calculates the result using an algorithm
    void performProcess()
    This method performs translation using some algorithm
    void readFromFile()
    This method read the input numbers from a file
    boolean userWantExecutionTime()
    Hook method to ask user if he/she wants to know execution time.
    void writeToFile()
    This method writes the calculated numbers to a file

    • userWantExecutionTime

      public boolean userWantExecutionTime() throws java.io.IOException
      Hook method to ask user if he/she wants to know execution time.
      Returns:
      true if user wants the know execution time
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if the operation of getting input from user goes wrong
